body.description: Any parameter can be sent, there's no mandatory parameters

update_mode_trainer.description: If sent along with trainer_id will update either all or just upcoming events

update_mode_trainer_rate_type.description: If sent along with trainer_rate_type_id will update either all or just upcoming events

update_mode_duration.description: If sent along with duration will update either all or just upcoming events

update_mode_place.description: If sent along with place_id and room_id will update either all or just upcoming events
